20110121010034.000|20110121010036.000|CC1|THINK THE GUY WOULD BE OUT HERE

20110121010045.000|20110121010046.000|CC1|OFFICER JUST OFF CAMPUS.

20110121010059.000|20110121010101.000|CC1|>> 5 1/2.                       
20110121010101.000|20110121010102.000|CC1|WITH NO FOOD, NO BATHROOM       
20110121010102.000|20110121010102.000|CC1|BREAKS, JUSTICE THERE.          
20110121010102.000|20110121010104.000|CC1|>> WE COULDN'T EAT ANYTHING,    
20110121010104.000|20110121010106.000|CC1|COULDN'T DRINK ANYTHING.        
20110121010106.000|20110121010106.000|CC1|EVERYONE WAS PAYING ON

20110121010625.000|20110121010625.000|CC1|HOUR.

20110121014107.000|20110121014107.000|CC1|THEATER.
